definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Three dispatchers were scanning cathode ray tube displays for information.
sentences.chinese: 三名调度员正在研究阴极射线管所显示的情报。

sentences.english: The corresponding electric currents are used to deflect an electron beam in a cathode-ray tube.
sentences.chinese: 相应的电流就用来使阴极射线管里的电子束偏转。

sentences.english: The so - called visual display unit is in fact a cathode ray tube.
sentences.chinese: 所谓可见显示装置实际上是一个阴极射线管。

sentences.english: Disclosed is a storage-transport device of an electron gun with a cathode ray tube.
sentences.chinese: 一种阴极射线管电子枪储运装置。

sentences.english: The expression "flat panel display" does not cover cathode-ray tube technology.
sentences.chinese: 所称“平板显示”不包括阴极射线管技术。

sentences.english: And if I evacuate it, I have a cathode ray tube.
sentences.chinese: 如果我对其抽真空，我会得到一根阴极射线管。

sentences.english: The operation remained focused on traditional cathode-ray-tube TVs until this year.
sentences.chinese: 但汤姆逊直到今年仍专注于传统的阴极射线管电视机。

sentences.english: A display device that uses a cathode ray tube.
sentences.chinese: 一种使用阴极射线管的显示装置。

definition: CRT used in TV or computer monitor/picture tube/kinescope

pinyin: dian4 he4 ou3 he2 qi4 jian4
